professionalSummary: Innovative R&D Engineer and Trusted Technical Advisor specializing in robotics, AI-driven computer vision, and advanced automation. Proven ability to rapidly prototype novel solutions, publish cutting-edge research, and provide up-to-date technical guidance on integrating emerging technologies into industrial processes.

experience.title: Application & Computer Vision Engineer
responsibilities: Designed and deployed AI-driven solutions for automated toolpath generation and defect detection, contributing to industry-leading R&D efforts in aerospace remanufacturing.
Provided on-site technical consulting to clients worldwide, troubleshooting system-level issues and optimizing robotic workflows.
Evaluated new technologies for integration into the Augmentus platform, driving continuous innovation in computer vision and robotics.

experience.title: Research & Development Engineer
responsibilities: Led AI and robotics research projects, developing large-area inspection systems using collaborative robots and mobile platforms with ROS.
Engineered a synthetic data pipeline to accelerate machine learning development, cutting labeling costs and time significantly.
Authored 2 peer-reviewed papers and contributed to 7 research inventions as main/co-inventor, showcasing a strong track record in innovation.

experience.title: Tech Lead & Co-Mechanical Lead (Undergraduate Research Team)
responsibilities: Coordinated advanced R&D for autonomous underwater vehicles, overseeing mechanical design, system simulation, and integration.
Mentored undergraduate researchers, fostering a culture of innovation and rigorous testing to achieve competitive performance internationally.

awards: First Place at NUS IEEE Hackathon

education.degree: Diploma in Aerospace Technology (with Business Minor)

honorsAwards: JTC-NUS Gold Medal for Final Year Project – Robotic Eye Surgery Mechanism Design
NUS IEEE Hackathon – Best Innovative & Mind-blowing Hack
Multiple academic awards in innovation, engineering design, and leadership
